title: How to Jump Over Rivers in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

steps.title: Craft a vaulting pole at a crafting bench.
steps.content: Craft a vaulting pole at a crafting bench. You'll just need 5 softwood. The DIY recipe is obtained from Blathers once he arrives on the island. If you don't have Blathers, you'll need to open the Museum first. You'll need a vaulting pole to leap across rivers. If you want to climb to a higher level on the island, you'll need to use a ladder instead.

steps.title: Equip the vaulting pole.
steps.content: Equip the vaulting pole. Open your inventory and select the vaulting pole to equip it. Your character should be holding it.

steps.title: Stand next to a river.
steps.content: Stand next to a river. You can vault across a river that is 3 spaces wide and doesn't have any furniture or fencing blocking the other side. [1] X Research source Be sure to face the direction you want to land.

steps.title: Press A.
steps.content: Press A . This will vault your character across the river. If you're unable to vault, the river may be too wide. In this case, you can walk up or down to find an area that is less wide. You can also build a bridge if you have enough Bells. You can vault as many times as you'd like. Unlike other tools, the vaulting pole will not break. Keep in mind that vaulting next to any fish will scare them away.
